text: Stephen ga duudagi adu hua ana helekai, “Goodou gu hamaaloo dangihi godou lodo! Gei godou manawa e bouli dongoeho! Gei godou dalinga e longoduli, e de longono nia helekai a God! Goodou e hai gadoo be godou maadua mmaadua. Goodou e hai baahi labelaa ang gi di Hagataalunga Dabu!7.51 Isaiah 63.10
